title: Queen Elizabeth Tests Positive for Covid-19 With Mild Symptoms
sub_head: Buckingham Palace says the 95-year-old monarch will continue light duties
body:
LONDON—Queen Elizabeth has tested positive for Covid-19, renewing attention on the 95-year-old monarch’s health.
The queen, who recently became Britain’s longest reigning monarch, is experiencing “mild cold-like symptoms,” Buckingham Palace said in a statement on Sunday.
